title: The Hour has Come
itunes:title: The Hour has Come
description: As we approach the Passion, the celebration of Jesus' death, we're called to a new life, a new glory, and a new way of being. We allow our lives to break open so they become a new source of life for others.
content:encoded: As we approach the Passion, the celebration of Jesus' death, we're called to a new life, a new glory, and a new way of being. We allow our lives to break open so they become a new source of life for others.
itunes:subtitle: As we approach the Passion, the celebration of Jesus' death, we're called to a new life, a new glory, and a new way of being. We allow our lives to break open so they become a new source of life for others.
itunes:summary: As we approach the Passion, the celebration of Jesus' death, we're called to a new life, a new glory, and a new way of being. We allow our lives to break open so they become a new source of life for others.
itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
